text: Happy Days is a 1929 American musical movie directed by Benjamin Stoloff and starring Marjorie White, Stuart Erwin, Charles E. Evans, Janet Gaynor, Victor McLaglen, Betty Grable, El Brendel. It was distributed by 20th Century Fox. ==Other websites== * * Category:1929 movies Category:1920s musical movies Category:American musical movies Category:20th Century Fox movies Category:Movies directed by Benjamin Stoloff
title: Happy Days (1929 movie)
